thread.title: BRIEF-Amazon Announces Plans To Expand Vancouver Tech Hub And Create 3,000 High Tech Jobs

title: BRIEF-Amazon Announces Plans To Expand Vancouver Tech Hub And Create 3,000 High Tech Jobs
text:
April 30, 2018 / 4:40 PM / Updated 2 minutes ago BRIEF-Amazon Announces Plans To Expand Vancouver Tech Hub And Create 3,000 High Tech Jobs Reuters Staff
April 30 (Reuters) - Amazon.com Inc:
* AMAZON ANNOUNCES PLANS TO EXPAND VANCOUVER TECH HUB AND CREATE 3,000 HIGH TECH JOBS
* ANNOUNCES PLANS TO EXPAND VANCOUVER TECH HUB AND CREATE 3,000 HIGH TECH JOBS
* WILL EXPAND INTO A NEW LOCATION IN QUADREALâ€™S POST REDEVELOPMENT WHEN PROJECT OPENS IN 2022
* EXPAND VANCOUVER TECH HUB & CREATE ADDITIONAL 3,000 JOBS IN FIELDS INCLUDING E-COMMERCE TECHNOLOGY, CLOUD COMPUTING, MACHINE LEARNING Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
